attributes.action: To open the access gate from Lhondhoo Close into Bemahague School.
attributes.background: Due to the  traffic around Bemahague School parents have been driving down Lhondhoo Close to avoid the congested area . By closing the gate the children are being punished not the drivers. The children's safety is now being put at risk by making them have an unnecessary extended journey.

rejection.details:
The Isle of man is a Crown Dependency which is not subordinate to the UK Government, and the UK Government and Parliament have no say in the day to day operation of the administration of the Island.

You may wish to raise your complaint about traffic services and road closures in Onchan with the Onchan District Commissioners. Details of how they operate are available on the Internet here:
http://www.onchan.org.im/your-commissioners/how-we-work
